Posts.Content: Apr 21, 2012 03:50PM kristinlee wrote: ((((ronnie)))) I feel the same way and I haven't even had my biopsy yet.  The waiting is the hardest part, I really think so.  I haven't taken a full breath in almost a week.  I am trying my best to stay busy and try to keep my mind off it.  It's not working.  Take the Xanax, if it will help you just take it.  I wish I had some lol  I'm eating everything in sight instead and that is NOT making me feel any better lol  Do you know how long it will be until you get your results?  Why does it have to take so long I don't understand?
Posts.Title: Waiting Club Day 2 Ronnie22 vballmom
